fr.liglab.adele.icasa.simulator.listener
Interface PersonListener

All Superinterfaces:
IcasaListener
All Known Subinterfaces:
SimulationMultiEventListener
public interface PersonListener
extends IcasaListener

The listener interface for receiving person Person events.

Author:
Gabriel Pedraza Ferreira

Method Summary
 void personAdded(Person person)
          Invoked when a person has been added to the iCasa Simulator.
 void personDeviceAttached(Person person, LocatedDevice device)
          Invoked when a device has been attached to a person
 void personDeviceDetached(Person person, LocatedDevice device)
          Invoked when a device has been detached from a person
 void personMoved(Person person, Position oldPosition)
          Invoked when a person has been moved, to see the new position invoke the getCenterAbsolutePosition() method.
 void personRemoved(Person person)
          Invoked when a person has been removed to the iCasa Simulator.
 

Method Detail

personAdded

void personAdded(Person person)
Invoked when a person has been added to the iCasa Simulator.

Parameters:
person - The added person.

personRemoved

void personRemoved(Person person)
Invoked when a person has been removed to the iCasa Simulator.

Parameters:
person - The removed person.

personMoved

void personMoved(Person person,
                 Position oldPosition)
Invoked when a person has been moved, to see the new position invoke the getCenterAbsolutePosition() method.

Parameters:
person - The moved person.
oldPosition - The last position center absolute position.

personDeviceAttached

void personDeviceAttached(Person person,
                          LocatedDevice device)
Invoked when a device has been attached to a person

Parameters:
person - the person
device - the attached device

personDeviceDetached

void personDeviceDetached(Person person,
                          LocatedDevice device)
Invoked when a device has been detached from a person

Parameters:
person - the person
device - the detached device
